| History                 = The Phantom Riders were an army of mortals living in the [[Skull City]], the secret citadel of the [[Congo (Region)|Congo]].{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 31}}

They were led by their king [[Baron Skullfire (Earth-616)|Baron Skullfire]], a Spirit of Vengeance.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 31}}

When [[Zadkiel (Earth-616)|Zadkiel]] [[Heaven's on Fire|rebelled]] against [[Heaven (Paradise)|Heaven]], he targeted the [[Spirits of Vengeance (Earth-616)|Spirits of Vengeance]] to gain their powers. Eventually, he had the [[Black Host (Earth-616)|Black Host]] led by [[Daniel Ketch (Earth-616)|Danny Ketch]] to attack Skull City, where the last Spirits of Vengeance (Baron Skullfire, his consort [[Marinette Bwa Chech (Earth-616)|Marinette Bwa Chech]], [[Molek (Earth-616)|Molek]], [[Bai Gu Jing (Earth-616)|Bai Gu Jing]], and [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Johnny Blaze]], along with the last [[Caretaker (Sara) (Earth-616)|Caretaker Sara]]).{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 31}}

During the battle, Baron Skullfire was killed, and his Spirit of Vengeance was reborn into a Phantom Rider. The battle was eventually lost as Danny Ketch created avatars of himself composed of [[Hellfire]] to defeat the Spirits of Vengeance.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 32}}
| Equipment               = Skull-helmets{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 31}}
